response.original_title: A Matter of Death and Life
response.overview: A film by Fruzsina Skrabski about life before birth and after death. The film deals with taboos such as death, abortion, artificial insemination. A Catholic, a Buddhist and an atheist try to interpret the world, while a dying woman, the first Hungarian test-tube baby and a pathologist will also appear.
response.title: A Matter of Death and Life
